text: The Five Dollar Baby is a 1922 American silent comedy film directed by Harry Beaumont and starring Viola Dana, Ralph Lewis and Otto Hoffman.Munden p.249 A family hock their baby to a pawnbroker for five dollars. ==Cast== * Viola Dana as Ruth * Ralph Lewis as Ben Shapinsky * Otto Hoffman as The Solitary Kid * John Harron as Larry Donovan * Tom McGuire as Mr. Donovan * Arthur Rankin as Bernie Riskin * Marjorie Maurice as Esther Block * Ernest Pasque as Isadore ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1922 films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:Films directed by Harry Beaumont Category:American silent feature films Category:English- language films Category:Metro Pictures films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1922 comedy films
title: The Five Dollar Baby
